mapper.insert: insert into FUNDING_CART(FC_NO, FC_DATE_TIME , USER_NO , FD_NO) values (fd_cart_seq.nextval , sysdate ,#{user_no} , #{fd_no})
mapper.select: select pj.fd_no , pj.fd_goals , pj.fd_title , nvl(pay.total_sum,0), pj.fd_img_name , to_date(pj.fd_enddate,'yy-mm-dd') - to_date(sysdate, 'yy-mm-dd') remain_day , nvl(trunc(pay.total_sum / pj.fd_goals,2)*100,0) rate , pj.fd_status from funding_pj pj , (select fd_no , sum(pay_total) total_sum from funding_pay group by fd_no) pay , funding_cart cart where pj.fd_no = pay.fd_no(+) and pj.fd_no = cart.fd_no and cart.user_no = #{user_no} order by cart.fc_date_time desc

SELECT b.BS_NO, b.BS_TITLE, b.BS_CONTENT ,b.BS_GOAL_CNT,b.BS_SUCCESS_CNT, b.BS_NAME, round(((b.BS_SUCCESS_CNT / b.BS_GOAL_CNT)*100),0) bs_rate,b.bs_recruit_end FROM BONGSA b,userinfo u, VOLUNTEER_CART cart where b.user_no = u.user_no and b.BS_NO = cart.bs_no and cart.user_no = #{user_no} order by cart.VC_DATE_TIME desc
